name: Get Groooovy
description: Do you know that feeling of listening to a song at a public place like a mall or a bowling alley and thinking, "Man, I've heard that one before!"? Because same.

questions.title: Welcome to the party!
questions.description:
I know I've heard this somewhere I know I've heard this somewhere I know I've heard....

questions.hint: This song looks like it lasts for hours! Or are those minutes?

questions.title: Let's get movin'
questions.description: "Do not merely listen to the word, and so deceive yourselves. Do what it says." And it says to go to the canteen at the global developing network
questions.hint: Which bible verse does the scripture belong to?

questions.title: Hello? Can you hear me?
questions.hint: Use twofish cipher with the given binary file
